attributes.action: Make Vindaloo by Fat Les the English National Anthem.
attributes.background: Vindaloo by Fat Les is a modern classic, and represents 21st century England (and Britain if you ignore the "ENGLAND" bit) far better than God Save the Queen could ever do. It is also much a much more rousing tune.

rejection.details:
This isn’t something that the UK Government or Parliament would be able to do. The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
